title: Set Up a Media Plan Spreadsheet
description: A media planner is starting a new media plan and needs to set up the initial spreadsheet.

tasks.description: Create columns for 'Channel', 'Campaign', 'Budget', 'Flight Dates', 'Target Audience', 'KPIs', and 'Forecasted Results'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up a well-structured template for the media plan.

tasks.description: Populate the sheet with the initial list of planned channels and campaigns.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds the first few rows of data to the plan.
